ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: These people are a small group
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: (Proclaiming): "Surely they are a small band (of fugitives).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: saying: "These (Israelites) are only a small band of people
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The Pharaoh sent word to all the cities saying,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They announced “These people are a small group.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: (Saying): "Verily, these indeed are but a small band."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Most surely these are a small company;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Behold, these are a small troop,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: (Who said): Lo! these indeed are but a little troop,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: These," they said, "are only a small band,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily these are but a band small.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: (Saying): "Verily! These indeed are but a small band.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: These' they said, 'are a small band,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [And said], "Indeed, those are but a small band,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:54] ‘Lo! these are but a small gang. It is said that they [the Children of Israel] numbered 670,000, while his [Pharaoh’s] vanguard alone numbered 700,000 and so he deemed their number insignificant in comparison to his huge army.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: ((Who said): Lo! These) the followers of Moses (indeed are but a little troop) a small group,
